Description:
Fantastic Investment with 4 Bedrooms
In the favoured Pasadena Estate in Clyde, within walking distance to the main Shopping Centre, this modern 2 year young, 4 bedroom home is the perfect investment property already tenanted until August or makes an ideal first home.
The home features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances that overlooks the enormous open plan living room with timber flooring, great for family entertaining and dining and also opens out onto the compact low maintenance garden ideal for tenanted properties.
Not to forget, the gas ducted heating, 4 big bedrooms each with robes, a full ensuite and a remote double garage with internal access.
All of this is in close proximity to Parks, Sporting Facilities, Coles Shopping, McDonalds and Schools.
A Terrific Investment, not to be missed, come see for yourself.
Insights: 16 Pyrenees Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Expect to be impressed
Proudly presenting this immaculate, near new family home that oozes with quality! With simply not a thing to do but move on in and enjoy! The home features:
- 4 bedrooms - master with en-suite and walk-in robe
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances, stone benches and walk in pantry
- 2 separate living zones include family/meals area plus second lounge room
- Nicely landscaped backyard with plenty of space for the kids to play
Extra comforts include: Internal access from the garage, ducted heating, timber floors, modern fixtures and fittings throughout and so much more! Conveniently situated in the highly sought after Pasadena Estate- close by to the brand new "Shopping on Clyde" shopping precinct, quality schools, parks, shops and public transport. To inspect and appreciate, call today!

Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Located in the Pasadena Estate in Clyde right next to the local shopping complex & Casey Fields sporting facilities is this near new & extremely well presented home. Offering you some amazing enjoyments:
* Three bedrooms (Oversized master bedroom with walk in robe & private ensuite). Remaining bedrooms with fitted robes & share a further bathroom.
* Well positioned centralised kitchen with plenty of overhead & under bench cupboard space, stone stops, modern s/s appliances plus a bonus dishwasher.
* Two separated living areas.
* AMAZING outdoor decked alfresco entertaining area featuring custom made cafe blinds & extended deck BBQ area with fully completed & large sized clean backyard.
Further to be enjoyed are ducted heating, split system air conditioner, internal garage access, modern downlighting, top quality window furnishings and so much more..
Walking distance to the local park, shopping complex and more, this is why Pasadena in Clyde is an extremely popular place to call home..

Description:
TOO LATE IT'S GONE
Just under 4 years young, this lovely 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom is ready and waiting. Conveniently located near St. Thomas Primary School, Clyde Primary School, Cranbourne Library, Shopping on Clyde Complex for all your errands and shopping needs, and only a very short drive to South Gippsland Hwy, which takes you straight to Princess Hwy, this fantastic opportunity is not to be missed.
With space enough for all occupants; this modern home boasts an open plan kitchen, meals and family area as well as a separate second entertainment area. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, featuring a gas stove top, oven, large pantry and dishwasher all draped in quality stone benchtops, it is the extra details that make this kitchen a dream. The opaque, modern ceramic tiling floor throughout provides a seamless style to suit any taste.
On offer are four bedrooms; the master bedroom with walk in robe and full en-suite and the other two bedrooms with built-in-robes. Other features of the home include ducted heating, internal access to the garage, all in-between the roof and walls of 10 Teviot in the heart of Clyde surrounded by your local conveniences.
This modern home is complimented with a low maintenance front and rear yard, and double garage with both internal and rear access and electric roller door.
Positioned only minutes to both the South Gippsland Highway, located close to several schools and lots of outdoor recreation space this lovely residence is the perfect opportunity for the first home owner, astute investor or those looking to downsize or even upgrade. Enquire today and snap up this near new home without having to wait through the building process.
Insights: 10 Teviot Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

BEAUTIFUL FAMILY LIFESTYLE ON 985SQM!
Presenting a rare opportunity in tightly held Clyde that must be seen to be appreciated! This immaculate fully renovated family home will suit those seeking extra space and a quiet yet classy lifestyle. Featuring master with full ensuite, two separate living zones, open fire, new floor & window coverings, split system heating & cooling, hostess kitchen with gas cooking overlooking the yard, double carport with rear access to the huge backyard with detached garage & so much more. Set on a massive 985sqm in the township of Clyde, offering a country feel in a unique location yet close enough to many amenities including Clyde Primary. Inspection is a must, Call Today!

Description:
Stylish, Classy and Convenient Living
This beautifully presented home offers modern and low-maintenance living in a quiet location. Consisting of multiple living areas including open plan meals and family room plus formal lounge/ rumpus. Overlooking the living and meals area, the well-appointed kitchen is central to the home and features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone benches, glass splash back and island bench.
The huge master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite. Further three bedrooms with built in robes serviced by the family bathroom with separate toilet. Outdoors is an entertainers dream with an absolutely stunning alfresco, perfect for entertaining in all seasons. It is a fantastic space that will be the envy of family and friends alike.
This feature packed home also offers a wide entrance hall, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, feature lighting, high ceilings, ceiling fans, stone benches throughout, solar hot water, home hub networking, security system throughout and a remote double garage. Also included is a large laundry with outdoor access. This property is ideally located with parkland right outside your front door.
This property provides everything you could need for relaxed family living!

Description:
Contemporary Elegance on Green Gully Road!
Live your dream life in this exquisite Clyde residence. With Fun play equipment and parkland right outside your front door step; this contemporary, sleek residence is designed for the modern urban lifestyle.
Display quality, elegantly built and has been packed with every imaginable family luxury for today's discerning buyer. Approx. 32 squares; boasting 9ft ceilings; square setting cornices; 4br; 2bth, two large living spaces one of which is a theatre room, 2 car garage; and so much more.
Enter through the grand entrance and be dazzled by the quality light fitting; followed through with the warmth of sheik carpet and tiling throughout.
At the central hub of the residence, you will find the extensive living and entertaining quarter. This quarter showcases the spectacular indoor and outdoor space; leading out to the undercover urban indoor-outdoor living. The alfresco provides a perfect year around entertaining venue.
The stunning designer kitchen provides a focus for relaxed entertaining within state of the art stainless steel appliances, large walk in pantry, Caesar stone benches open plan meals and family living areas.
Reinvigorate yourself in the luxurious master suite. The master suite features walk in robe ready to house your finest garments. The luxurious ensuite boasts stone benches, a large shower and his and hers vanity A further three generous bedrooms all offering BIR and an equally generous main bathroom with stone benches.
This Masterpiece is completed by the 2 cars garage, High-end features abound throughout this grand residence, including feature lighting; ducted heating, split system cooling and so much more.
Not included: is Richie the Labrador, he posed especially for this photo :)
For further information or an obligation free appraisal, contact Raine & Horne Lyndhurst.
Insights: 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Central Future Residential Development Opportunity 25.5a
The Land
Rare opportunity exists to purchase and develop this magnificent flat and useable 25.5a property (STCA). Situated in the Urban Growth Zone of Clyde, just off the South Gippsland Hwy:
- 8km to Cranbourne
- 15km to Berwick Shopping Centre
- 60kms to Melbourne CBD
Futhermore, this blue chip property is located amongst good company, with over 300Ha of land around the area land banked by the large development companies Mirvac and Evolve Development.
With major services located at the front of the property
The Homestead
Overlooking this large parcel of land the modern residence responds to contemporary family needs - and does so in a style that's rich in significant character and charm. Classical lines and open plan living introduce the formal lounge and family rooms that overlook panoramic views of this superb property. At the rear, light fills the large study/ 4th bedroom, and main bedroom with dressing room and ensuite with feature spa. The two other separately zoned bedrooms, share a modern bathroom.
The stylish kitchen is complete with stainless appliances, stone benches and cupboard space a plenty, complimented with an everyday dining space.
Other home comforts include a large laundry with stone benches, workshop and double garage. Reverse cycle heating, ultra-high insulation, and solar hot water and electricity.
The Facilities
The property features a large extra height barn with stables. Multiple horse paddocks with electric fencing, reticulated water, a bore and paddock shelters. Large high fenced round yard, arena, second house and shedding aplenty.
This is a home and land which demonstrates timeless desirability and an abundance of potential in a tightly held development location.
Insights: 45 Manks Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016.

Address: Lot 123 Grande Belmond Avenue Clyde VIC 3978
Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
BELMOND ON CLYDE (201538898): Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This spacious allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Belmond on Clyde! This premium, titled parcel of land measures app. 400m2 and with a frontage of app. 12.5m and a depth of app. 32m the land itself is regular in shape and flat as a pancake! With plenty of award winning designs to pick from any builder would have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation! What are you waiting for? Contact your builder today and get ready to start pouring the slab!
An intimate and quiet community, Belmond offers you the perfect escape right in the heart of Casey. With an array of shopping, community and education choices at your fingertips, this is the perfect place to call home.
With peaceful streets, a picturesque central park and app. 3.7 hectares of open space all nestled amongst rolling hills it's a sanctuary that will keep the world at bay and provide a sense of security and privacy!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With further shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants! Those of you who work or enjoy wining and dining in the CBD will certainly appreciate the nearby freeway facilities, it's only a brisk app. 45 minute drive away!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call now before it's selling, selling..... SOLD!
MAKE AN ENQUIRY TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT FUTURE OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*!

Description:
190 Acres of Prime Development Opportunity on 2 titles
Alex Scott are proud to present this large parcel of land on two titles and all the options it presents.
Horses, cattle, crops, land bank or all of the above - you decide.
Currently used as a successful Wagyu cattle and Warmblood and thoroughbred stud, one option would be to continue to enjoy this property in its current use.
Horse facilities include multiple paddocks and yards ( including 3 foaling paddocks, 3 stallion paddocks, several day yards and 6 large approx 15 acres paddocks to allow your horses to roam and stretch their legs and be horses, as well as another 10 horse paddocks of varying sizes)
Almost all the horse paddocks have large run in sheds with the larger paddocks having 6x3metre sheds.
Other horse facilities include 8 large stables , extra wide breezeway, a large post and rubber lined round yard, a 70 x 35 metre fully fenced sand ménage and under cover float parking area.
All horse paddocks are either post and rail or 3 strand electric plus one strand sight wire.
The cattle facilities include a large bull paddock separated by a laneway and extra high fences from the 3 large cattle paddocks (2 x 20 acre approx and 1 x 40 acre approx) All cattle paddocks are less than two years old including the boundary fence and are all barb wire.
There are also centrally located new cattle yards and a crush connected by multiple laneways for easy one person operation.
Water to stock is by way of a bore.
There is ample shedding including a huge hay shed able to store over 200 large round bales, a large ex-shearing shed/ workshop, a lockable tack room and a feed room.
The black peat soil on the property also lends itself to growing crops, including asparagus, for which the region is world famous for.
All this within 5 km of the Urban Growth Zone. 3 minutes from Tooradin , 10 minutes from Cranbourne , 15 minutes from Pakenham , or jump on the Monash freeway and be in the CBD in the about 50 mins.
Based on projections by the Bureau of Statistics - by 2060 Melbourne will overtake Sydney doubling its population to 8.5 million, making land on the city fringe the place to buy. Besides from Melbourne doubling its population over the next thirty years there are a number of projects that may go ahead which would be a huge boost to the local area like dredging in Tooradin for international shipping and an international airport in Lang Lang. Both of these major projects could create over 150,000 local jobs resulting in greater need for housing, commercial and industrial land.
There is a 3 bedroom home that is habitable but in need of TLC or TNT. The current owners have a current planning and building permit to build a new home but due to a change in circumstances have decided not to build and are motivated to sell.
Insights: Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2009 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique design. Central location
Look no further than this ultra-modern, high-quality built family home, set in the highly sought after Pasadena Estate. The home features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms - master with en-suite, walk-in robe and private courtyard
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances and stone benches
- 2 separate living zones include family/meals area plus second lounge
- Stacker doors opening on to the outdoor entertaining area with still plenty of space for the kids to play
Extra comforts include: Double garage with internal access, ducted heating, evap cooling, modern fixtures and fittings throughout, 3.6m ceiling in main living area and much more! Not to mention the spectacular location with Casey Race Recreation Centre, the brand new "Shopping on Clyde" shopping precinct, quality schools, parks, shops and public transport - this one is not to be missed! For your private inspection, call today!
Insights: 18 Hill Farm Drive, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate on the inside, Beautiful on the outside!
A truly stunning property, you will fall in love with this gorgeous two bedroom townhouse fit for a first home buyer or investor looking for a spotless home, a home you will be proud of inside and out! Only three years young, this home features two bedrooms plus a study nook, master bedroom with triple robe and access to bathroom and the second bedroom with double robe. The kitchen is a delight, complete with electric oven, gas hot plates and space for a dishwasher. Also featuring an open plan meals area and cosy family room, plus enjoy ducted heating throughout to keep warm in the chilly season. Enjoy the fantastic low maintenance courtyard, the perfect place for a beverage shared amongst friends and family. Feel at ease knowing your car will be secure in your very own single remote garage with internal access. Sitting pretty in a prime position in Clyde, you will also love the convenient location, close to shops, parks, schools and public transport. Offer now or miss out.
Insights: 33 Bimberry Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2016 and 1 other 2 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.
